# Python正则表达式

## 通用匹配`match()`

+ [Python3正则表达式教程](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/28920775)

+ `\d`匹配任意数字，等价于 [0-9]

```{python a,message = F, comment = NA,warning = F,include = T,fig.align='center',out.width ='100%',fig.asp=0.7}
import re
text = "foo bar\t baz \tqux"
re.split('\s+', text)

regex = re.compile('\s+')
regex

regex.findall(text)

re.match('www', 'www.runoob.com').group()

wb = re.search(r'FishC', 'I love FishC.com!')
wb.group()

re.search(r'.','I love FishC.com!').group()

re.match(r'.','I love FishC.com!').group()#

content = 'Hello 123 4567 World_This is a Regex Demo'
result = re.match('^Hello\s\d\d\d\s\d{4}\s\w{10}', content)
result
#print(result.group())
#print(result.group(1))
result.span()
```

`match()`方法会尝试从字符串的起始位置匹配正则表达式，如果匹配，就返回匹配成功的结果，如果不匹配，那就返回None。

`group()`方法可以输出匹配到的内容

+ 万能匹配符`.*`:

```{python b,message = F, comment = NA,warning = F,include = T,fig.align='center',out.width ='100%',fig.asp=0.7}
import re
content = 'Hello 123 4567 World_This is a Regex Demo'
result = re.match('^Hello.*Demo$', content)
result
result.group()

content = 'Hello 1234567 World_This is a Regex Demo'
result = re.match('^Hello\s(\d+)\sWorld', content)

result.group()
result.group(1)

```




## 贪婪匹配与非贪婪匹配

```{python c,message = F, comment = NA,warning = F,include = T,fig.align='center',out.width ='100%',fig.asp=0.7}
import re
content = 'Hello 1234567 World_This is a Regex Demo'
result = re.match('^He.*?(\d+).*Demo$', content)
result.group(1)


```

```{python d,message = F, comment = NA,warning = F,include = T,fig.align='center',out.width ='100%',fig.asp=0.7}
content = 'Extra stings Hello 1234567 World_This 321 is a Regex Demo Extra stings'
result = re.search('Hello.*?(\d+).*?Demo', content)
result.group(1)

# 贪婪匹配
result = re.search('Hello.*(\d+).*Demo', content)
result.group(1)


```

## 转义匹配

```{python e,message = F, comment = NA,warning = F,include = T,fig.align='center',out.width ='100%',fig.asp=0.7}
html = '''<div id="songs-list">
    <h2 class="title">经典老歌</h2>
    <p class="introduction">
        经典老歌列表
    </p>
    <ul id="list" class="list-group">
        <li data-view="2">一路上有你</li>
        <li data-view="7">
            <a href="/2.mp3" singer="任贤齐">沧海一声笑</a>
        </li>
        <li data-view="4" class="active">
            <a href="/3.mp3" singer="齐秦">往事随风</a>
        </li>
        <li data-view="6"><a href="/4.mp3" singer="beyond">光辉岁月</a></li>
        <li data-view="5"><a href="/5.mp3" singer="陈慧琳">记事本</a></li>
        <li data-view="5">
            <a href="/6.mp3" singer="邓丽君"><i class="fa fa-user"></i>但愿人长久</a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>'''

result = re.search('<li.*?active.*?singer="(.*?)">(.*?)</a>', html, re.S)
if result:
    print(result.group(1), result.group(2))

```
